```swift
func testSyncedFolderDialog() {
    let item = SyncedFolderDisplayItem(id: 1,
                                       localPath: "/sdcard/DCIM/",
                                       remotePath: "/InstantUpload/",
                                       isEnabled: true,
                                       isSyncing: false,
                                       isSyncError: false,
                                       isSyncEnabled: true,
                                       accountName: "test@https://nextcloud.localhost",
                                       lastSyncResult: 0,
                                       lastSyncTime: 0,
                                       isMediaFolder: true,
                                       mediaFolderSize: 1000,
                                       name: "Name",
                                       mediaFolderType: .image,
                                       isSubFolder: false,
                                       subFolderRule: .yearMonth,
                                       isSyncingSubFolder: false,
                                       syncStatus: .notScannedYet)
    let sut = SyncedFolderPreferencesDialogFragment.newInstance(item: item, requestCode: 0)

    let intent = Intent(context: targetContext, class: SyncedFoldersActivity.self)
    let activity = activityRule.launchActivity(intent: intent)

    sut.show(fragmentManager: activity.supportFragmentManager, tag: "")

    getInstrumentation().waitForIdleSync()
    shortSleep()

    screenshot(view: sut.requireDialog().window?.decorView)
}
```
